name: Michelle CORTEGUERA v. Larry McFARLIN, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPAD AROS and CAPPY, JJ.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Michelle CORTEGUERA v. Larry McFARLIN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Vincent J. Quinn, Chief Public Defender, for appellant.
Nina B. Shapiro, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
615 A.2d 734
Michelle CORTEGUERA v. Larry McFARLIN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 19, 1992.
Decided Nov. 16, 1992.
Vincent J. Quinn, Chief Public Defender, for appellant.
Nina B. Shapiro, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPAD AROS and CAPPY, JJ.
